title: Swamps
description: Swamps are a varied and diverse part of the global landscape. Swamps provides students with an introduction to the many ways this unique habitat supports the health of our planet. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine the main idea and supporting details and to effectively ask and answer questions.
reviewWords: clean, fresh water, healthy, salt water, soil, swamp
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Determine main idea and supporting details
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /h/ sound
grammar: Simple Subject                : Recognize and use simple subjects
